net.leksi.io

Class BranchReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.io.Reader
      • net.leksi.io.BranchReader
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Closeable, java.lang.AutoCloseable, java.lang.Readable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BranchReader.Root.Branch

    public abstract class BranchReader
extends java.io.Reader
    The class BranchReader is for different consumers to independently read the same Reader.
    Since:
    JDK1.8
    Author:
    Alexey Zakharov <leksi@leksi.net>

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      private static class  BranchReader.ChunkHolder
      The class ChunkHolder is an auxiliary class to support a singly linked list of data pieces read from the underlying Reader.
      private static class  BranchReader.Root
      The class Root is an infrastructure holder for the tree of BranchReader objects.

      • Fields inherited from class java.io.Reader

        lock

      BranchReader() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      abstract BranchReader[] branch(int count)
      Returns an array of count new branches BranchReader which can be read from the current position of the parent's BranchReader.
      static BranchReader create(java.io.Reader source)
      A factory method for creation of an BranchReader object of the concrete implementation based on the openned underlying Reader.
      abstract boolean isClosed()
      Returns a boolean value meaning if the BranchReader is closed.

    • Method Detail

      • branch

        public abstract BranchReader[] branch(int count)
                               throws java.io.IOException
        Returns an array of count new branches BranchReader which can be read from the current position of the parent's BranchReader.
        Parameters:
        count - a number of new branches
        Returns:
        an array of new branches
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if it is closed

      • isClosed

        public abstract boolean isClosed()
        Returns a boolean value meaning if the BranchReader is closed.
        Returns:
        a boolean value meaning if the BranchReader is closed

      • create

        public static BranchReader create(java.io.Reader source)
        A factory method for creation of an BranchReader object of the concrete implementation based on the openned underlying Reader. The reading is possible from the current position of the source.
        Parameters:
        source - the preliminary openned Reader
        Returns:
        root BranchReader object
